html:
Dec 15 (Reuters) - Wall Street securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several U.S.-listed companies, including Azek Company, Galera Therapeutics and Vivint Smart Home, on Wednesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Azek Company Inc AZEK.N: JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

* Comcast Corp CMCSA.O: Citigroup cuts to neutral from buy

* Galera Therapeutics Inc GRTX.O: BTIG raises to buy from neutral

* Synovus Financial Corp SNV.N: JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

* Vivint Smart Home Inc VVNT.N: Evercore ISI cuts to in line from outperform

Following is a summary of research actions on U.S. companies reported by Reuters on Wednesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.
